text: It's a decent gaming laptop for the money. Performance is good for most games like Cyberpunk 2077, but it can struggle a bit with the newest AAA titles on ultra settings with the Lenovo Legion Y520 80WK00FCUS 15.6" IPS Intel Core i7 7th Gen 7700HQ (2.80 GHz) NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 Ti 8 GB Memory 128 GB M.2 PCIe SSD 1 TB HDD Windows 10 Home 64-Bit Gaming Laptop. The screen brightness is okay, not great. Overall, it gets the job done.

Exceeded my expectations! Perfect for streaming games.
